verses.verse: And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Jacob, <WH3290> Arise, <WH6965> go up <WH5927> to Bethel, <WH1008> and dwell <WH3427> there: <WH8033> and make <WH6213> there <WH8033> an altar <WH4196> unto God, <WH410> that appeared <WH7200> unto <WH413> thee when thou fleddest <WH1272> from the face <WH4480> <WH6440> of Esau <WH6215> thy brother. <WH251>

Then Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> unto <WH413> his household, <WH1004> and to <WH413> all <WH3605> that <WH834> were with <WH5973> him, Put away <WH5493> <WH853> the strange <WH5236> gods <WH430> that <WH834> are among <WH8432> you, and be clean, <WH2891> and change <WH2498> your garments: <WH8071>

And let us arise, <WH6965> and go up <WH5927> to Bethel; <WH1008> and I will make <WH6213> there <WH8033> an altar <WH4196> unto God, <WH410> who answered <WH6030> me in the day <WH3117> of my distress, <WH6869> and was <WH1961> with <WH5973> me in the way <WH1870> which <WH834> I went. <WH1980>

And they gave <WH5414> unto <WH413> Jacob <WH3290> <WH853> all <WH3605> the strange <WH5236> gods <WH430> which <WH834> were in their hand, <WH3027> and all their earrings <WH5141> which <WH834> were in their ears; <WH241> and Jacob <WH3290> hid <WH2934> them under <WH8478> the oak <WH424> which <WH834> was by <WH5973> Shechem. <WH7927>

And they journeyed: <WH5265> and the terror <WH2847> of God <WH430> was <WH1961> upon <WH5921> the cities <WH5892> that <WH834> were round about <WH5439> them, and they did not <WH3808> pursue <WH7291> after <WH310> the sons <WH1121> of Jacob. <WH3290>

So Jacob <WH3290> came <WH935> to Luz, <WH3870> which <WH834> is in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> that <WH1931> is, Bethel, <WH1008> he <WH1931> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that <WH834> were with <WH5973> him.

And he built <WH1129> there <WH8033> an altar, <WH4196> and called <WH7121> the place <WH4725> El-bethel: <WH416> because <WH3588> there <WH8033> God <WH430> appeared <WH1540> unto <WH413> him, when he fled <WH1272> from the face <WH4480> <WH6440> of his brother. <WH251>

But Deborah <WH1683> Rebekah's <WH7259> nurse <WH3243> died, <WH4191> and she was buried <WH6912> beneath <WH4480> <WH8478> Bethel <WH1008> under <WH8478> an oak: <WH437> and the name <WH8034> of it was called <WH7121> Allon-bachuth. <WH439>
And God <WH430> appeared <WH7200> unto <WH413> Jacob <WH3290> again, <WH5750> when he came <WH935> out of Padan-aram, <WH4480> <WH6307> and blessed <WH1288> him.

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto him, Thy name <WH8034> is Jacob: <WH3290> thy name <WH8034> shall not <WH3808> be called <WH7121> any more <WH5750> Jacob, <WH3290> but <WH3588> <WH518> Israel <WH3478> shall be <WH1961> thy name: <WH8034> and he called <WH7121> <WH853> his name <WH8034> Israel. <WH3478>

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto him, I <WH589> am God <WH410> Almighty: <WH7706> be fruitful <WH6509> and multiply; <WH7235> a nation <WH1471> and a company <WH6951> of nations <WH1471> shall be <WH1961> of <WH4480> thee, and kings <WH4428> shall come out <WH3318> of thy loins; <WH4480> <WH2504>

And the land <WH776> which <WH834> I gave <WH5414> Abraham <WH85> and Isaac, <WH3327> to thee I will give <WH5414> it, and to thy seed <WH2233> after <WH310> thee will I give <WH5414> <WH853> the land. <WH776>
And God <WH430> went up <WH5927> from <WH4480> <WH5921> him in the place <WH4725> where <WH834> he talked <WH1696> with <WH854> him.

And Jacob <WH3290> set up <WH5324> a pillar <WH4676> in the place <WH4725> where <WH834> he talked <WH1696> with <WH854> him, even a pillar <WH4678> of stone: <WH68> and he poured <WH5258> a drink offering <WH5262> thereon, <WH5921> and he poured <WH3332> oil <WH8081> thereon. <WH5921>
And Jacob <WH3290> called <WH7121> <WH853> the name <WH8034> of the place <WH4725> where <WH834> God <WH430> spoke <WH1696> with <WH854> him, Bethel. <WH1008>

And they journeyed <WH5265> from Bethel; <WH4480> <WH1008> and there was <WH1961> but <WH5750> a little way <WH3530> <WH776> to come <WH935> to Ephrath: <WH672> and Rachel <WH7354> travailed, <WH3205> and she had hard <WH7185> labor. <WH3205>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when she was in hard <WH7185> labor, <WH3205> that the midwife <WH3205> said <WH559> unto her, Fear <WH3372> not; <WH408> thou shalt have this <WH2088> son <WH1121> also. <WH1571>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> as her soul <WH5315> was in departing, <WH3318> (for <WH3588> she died) <WH4191> that she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Ben-oni: <WH1126> but his father <WH1> called <WH7121> him Benjamin. <WH1144>
And Rachel <WH7354> died, <WH4191> and was buried <WH6912> in the way <WH1870> to Ephrath, <WH672> which <WH1931> is Bethlehem. <WH1035>
And Jacob <WH3290> set <WH5324> a pillar <WH4676> upon <WH5921> her grave: <WH6900> that <WH1931> is the pillar <WH4678> of Rachel's <WH7354> grave <WH6900> unto <WH5704> this day. <WH3117>
And Israel <WH3478> journeyed, <WH5265> and spread <WH5186> his tent <WH168> beyond <WH4480> <WH1973> the tower <WH4026> of Edar. <WH4029>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when Israel <WH3478> dwelt <WH7931> in that <WH1931> land, <WH776> that Reuben <WH7205> went <WH1980> and lay with <WH7901> <WH853> Bilhah <WH1090> his father's <WH1> concubine: <WH6370> and Israel <WH3478> heard <WH8085> it. Now the sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290> were <WH1961> twelve: <WH8147> <WH6240>
The sons <WH1121> of Leah; <WH3812> Reuben, <WH7205> Jacob's <WH3290> firstborn, <WH1060> and Simeon, <WH8095> and Levi, <WH3878> and Judah, <WH3063> and Issachar, <WH3485> and Zebulun: <WH2074>
The sons <WH1121> of Rachel; <WH7354> Joseph, <WH3130> and Benjamin: <WH1144>
And the sons <WH1121> of Bilhah, <WH1090> Rachel's <WH7354> handmaid; <WH8198> Dan, <WH1835> and Naphtali: <WH5321>

And the sons <WH1121> of Zilpah, <WH2153> Leah's <WH3812> handmaid; <WH8198> Gad, <WH1410> and Asher: <WH836> these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Jacob, <WH3290> which <WH834> were born <WH3205> to him in Padan-aram. <WH6307>

And Jacob <WH3290> came <WH935> unto <WH413> Isaac <WH3327> his father <WH1> unto Mamre, <WH4471> unto the city of Arbah, <WH7153> which <WH1931> is Hebron, <WH2275> where <WH834> <WH8033> Abraham <WH85> and Isaac <WH3327> sojourned. <WH1481>
And the days <WH3117> of Isaac <WH3327> were <WH1961> a hundred <WH3967> and fourscore <WH8084> years. <WH8141>

And Isaac <WH3327> gave up the ghost, <WH1478> and died, <WH4191> and was gathered <WH622> unto <WH413> his people, <WH5971> being old <WH2205> and full <WH7649> of days: <WH3117> and his sons <WH1121> Esau <WH6215> and Jacob <WH3290> buried <WH6912> him.
